task1.title: Take the dog for a walk
task1.description: You have to take the dog out for at least 30 minutes. Don't let it go too far. Be careful when crossing streets.

task2.title: Do the grocery shopping
task2.description: You are responsible for planning our weekly diet and buy fruits, vegetables, meat and other food-items with the help of another person.

task3.title: Do Laundry
task3.description: You will do the laundry, dry them well, fold them and put them in closet

task4.title: Cook daily meals
task4.description: This task involves daily cooking, you can alter the days with another person.

task5.title: Vaccuum the house
task5.description: The house needs to cleaned and you have to vaccuum all the carpets.

task6.title: Wash the dishes
task6.description: Everyone will wash their own dishes but the extra cooking pots, plates etc have to be cleaned by you.

task7.title: Take the garbage out
task7.description: Everyday you must take the garbage out and dump int the correct categories.
